channel.title: A sword based off of Krackkid's most recent sword
channel.description: [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/29zv9dz.png[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/jglawg.png[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/n5hbtx.png[/img] I know the poly is bad on the handle. Don't say it.[size=1pt] When I was trying to upload 3 third picture tinypic kept giving me upside-down letters.[/size] This is in Meta. I changed the colors a while back because the gay blue and pink shit looked bad.

item.title: A sword based off of Krackkid's most recent sword
item.dc:creator: @h1_sk1ller h1 sk1ller
item.description:
@h1_sk1ller wrote:

Rash:

The poly is bad on the handle

It’s actually not, the attachment of the ‘handle’ and the hilt isn’t exactly great but there is nothing wrong other than a little un-needed polygons on the hilt…

Read full topic

item.title: A sword based off of Krackkid's most recent sword
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:10, topic:381030”]There’s not enough verts in the middle of the hilt to connect the blade to, unless you’re wanting me to connect the blade to the handle and have the blue part phased through it?[/quote]your facing the same problem most people have when modeling hands.they need tons of segments on the fingers but they don’t need 30 segments on the wrist. The solution is to curve the faces back to where they originated from.

Read full topic

item.title: A sword based off of Krackkid's most recent sword
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:4, topic:381030”][quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=476848.msg3487840#msg3487840 date=1296725608]
Didn’t know how to connect it tbh D:
[/quote]Idk in meta I think you take both sides and do “Join closed verts” or something.[/quote]
That’s because the vertices aren’t close enough.

item.title: A sword based off of Krackkid's most recent sword
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

To be honest, your wires aren’t bad. I had more, but mine was surfed more.

Overall it looks fairly clean, but you should of connected the sword to the hilt, not just put it in like that o.o

8/10

Read full topic
